data.quote: Too many people believe that everything must be pleasureable in life
data.author: Robert Greene

data.quote: A rational person can find peace by cultivating indifference to thingsoutside of their control
data.author: Naval Ravikant

data.quote: If it is endurable, then endure it. stop complaining
data.author: Marcus Aurelius

data.quote: The mind that is anxious about future events is miserable
data.author: Seneca

data.quote: The great law of nature is that it never stops. there is no end
data.author: Ryan Holiday

data.quote: Don't explain your philosophy. embody it
data.author: Epictetus

data.quote: Stoicism is about the domestication of emotions, noth their elimination
data.author: Nassim Nicholas Taleb

data.quote: Wealth consists not in having great possessions, but in having few wants
data.author: Epictetus

data.quote: Life is a shipwreck, but we must not forget to sing in the lifeboats
data.author: Voltaire

data.quote: What we fear doing most is usually what we most need to do
data.author: Tim Ferris
